segments.text: Hi , Lucy , you are very popular with people around you , what are your tricks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for saying so . I don ’ t know , probably because I like sharing my experience and knowledge with them . I think this kind of communication helps to improve our work efficiency and also helps to get along with colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sharing knowledge can be very settled and some second stances . People may think you are telling them how to do their work . If they take it personally , they feel angry at you and even become reluctant to support you at work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is true . Some people will misunderstand your intention and lets you do it in the long threatening way . For example , it is not sensible at all to arguing with the others or correcting someone in front of other people . To show your friendliness and willingness to share is much more important than to show off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are quite right . Thank you for sharing your experience with me . I learned a lot .
segments.speaker: S1
